body:
Comment 1: 
I suspect, Windows ping command expects 3 parameters: "-n", "1", "www.baidu.com", not 2
parameters that you pass: "-n 1", "www.baidu.com". If you change program to do

c := exec.Command("ping", "-n", "1", "www.baidu.com")

it will work for you.

Alex
_Owner changed to @alexbrainman._ _Status changed to **WorkingAsIntended**._
